parameters.name: AssertKey
parameters.description:
The type of the log subscription. Valid values:

*   **risk**: risk information.
*   **event**: attack event information.
*   **asset**: asset information.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to query the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region where the WAF instance is deployed. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the Alibaba Cloud resource group.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of API security log subscription. Valid values:

*   **true**: enabled.
*   **false**: disabled.
